history.proof: intros x. unfold Cmod, Rmax, Rabs. destruct x as [x1 x2]. strivial use: sqrt_plus_sqr unfold: Rmax, snd, fst, Rabs inv: sumbool.

ctx: apply Rle_trans with (r2 := sqrt (Rmax (Rabs x1) (Rabs x2))).
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros x. unfold Cmod, Rmax, Rabs. destruct x as [x1 x2]. simpl. apply Rle_trans with (r2 := sqrt (Rmax (Rabs x1) (Rabs x2))). - apply sqrt_le_1_alt. apply Rmax_l. - apply sqrt_le_1_alt. apply Rmax_r.
